info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 17 at 11:44AM CDT until August 19 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS La Crosse WI
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in La Crosse WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota...
Cedar River near Lansing affecting Mower County.
Cedar River at Austin affecting Mower County.
.Rainfall amounts Saturday night into Sunday morning were in the 3 to 5 inch range, with amounts in the City of Austin around 1 to 2 inches. This precipitation is expected to route into area waterways and bring the Cedar River above flood stage. These forecasts include an additional 0.5 to 0.75 inches of precipitation expected Sunday night into Monday morning. If additional precipitation amounts exceed these amounts, the river may rise above the current forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Cedar River at Austin.
* WHEN...From this evening to early Tuesday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Numerous homes and businesses may be threatened by high water.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 5.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 17.5 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse.
The next statement will be issued late tonight by midnight CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING
